outputs.output_descr:
The National Capacity Building Programme for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs (MFA) is a continuation of support provided by UNDP to the Ministry of Foreign Affairs since 2000. The Project aims to assist the Ministry to further strengthen its institutional and human resource capacity. The Project will enable the MFA to initiate a Foreign Service training program, introduce a modern human resource development and management system, make professional resources available to its staff in a Reference and Resource Center, improve its organizational structure and business processes, establish a corporate management information system (MIS), improve the quality and security of internal communication, properly equip and automate its offices, further develop its official website, and strengthen its Information Technology (IT) Department.

The main outputs of the project are:

1.	Foreign Service training initiated within MFA
2.	Human resource development and management system introduced in accordance with MFA needs, national law, and international best practices
3.	Organizational structure and businesses processes improved
4.	MFA corporate management information system (MIS) established
5.	Quality and security of internal communication improved
6.	MFA offices equipped and automated
7.	Flexible information technology (IT) support provided throughout MFA

project_descr:
National Capacity Building Programme for the Ministry of
Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Azerbaijan
project_title: Capacity Building for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs
